required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Registry Measuring the Impact of Adding RNA Expression Testing on Referral Decisions in Early Stage Lung Cancer Patients and Assessing the Disease-free Survival With Long-term Follow-up
clinical_study.official_title: LUNG CAncerREgistry: An Open Registry to Measure the Impact of Adding RNA Expression Testing (myPlan Lung Cancer) on Referral Decisions and to Assess Disease-free Survival With Long-term Follow-up in Newly Diagnosed Early Stage Lung Adenocarcinoma Patients

brief_summary.textblock: This registry is intended to measure the effect of myPlan Lung Cancer™ test has on treatment decisions of Surgeons when added to standard clinical-pathological parameters in patients with early stage NSCLC.The sponsor is conducting two parallel registries, with one directed at Surgeons (ONC003) and the other at Oncologists (ONC006).This registry is specific to Surgeons (ONC003). Outcomes measures on lung cancer relapse and death from any cause will be collected.

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage change from Pre-Test to Post-Test referral
primary_outcome.description: The percentage change from the recorded PRE-TEST referral by surgeon versus the POST-TEST referral following results of myPlan Lung Cancer testing

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage change from the Pre-test referral to the 60-day Post-Test referral
secondary_outcome.description: The percentage change from the recorded Pre-Test referral by surgeon versus the 60 day post-test actual referral attendance

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of patients at 60 days post test receiving treatment
secondary_outcome.description: The percentage of patients at 60 day post-test who are receiving radiation and or chemotherapy treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage change from Pre-Test to Post-Test chest surveillance plan
secondary_outcome.description: The percentage change from the recorded Pre-Test chest surveillance plan versus the Post-Test chest surveillance plan

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of disease free survival from resection to relapse or death
secondary_outcome.description: Disease-free survival, which is defined as the time from resection to the first of two events: lung cancer relapse or death from any cause

biospec_descr.textblock: Formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tissue from blocks or slides of prostatic adenocarcinoma biopsies.

study_pop.textblock: Recently diagnosed treatment-naïve patients with early stage NSCLC (lung adenocarcinoma)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Diagnosis of early stage non-small cell lung adenocarcinoma
- Sub-population staging (IA, IB or IIA) as judged by the standard of practice at the investigational site
- Resection of tumor within previous 2 months of enrollment
- ECOG performance of 0-2
- A minimum life expectancy of six months
Exclusion Criteria:
- Pre-operative radiation or chemotherapy for NSCLC
- Post-operative radiation or chemotherapy for NSCLC
- Enrollment in a separate clinical trial restricting treatment options
- Unable to provide informed consent
